channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData

item.title: #es @ 1503496591084249093
item.description:
#LoUltimo 🙏Por debajo de 100📉
Tras 63 semanas: La Villa Panamericana reporta menos de 100 hospitalizados por #COVID19 ➡️ 91
#OjoAlDato En esta #TerceraOla el 19/01 se registró la cifra más alta con 2,158, ésta se ha reducido en 96%.
Fuente: #DatosAbiertos SuSalud https://t.co/JTWFHBhjQj

item.title: #en @ 1503482423396372480
item.description:
half a year ago i started working on a modern way of reading & representing professional reputation — based on open data, allowing for anonymity, not relying on prestigious credentials & whatever one posts about themselves on the internet
just pure signal in the sea of noise

item.title: #fr @ 1503436385885245448
item.description:
Plusieurs usagers avaient signalé à l’@audmr la disparition des numéros SIRET de l’open data des demandes de terrasses estivales.
Nous sommes intervenus auprès du service concerné qui les a rétablis : https://t.co/VZ8hWNaM0T
Saluons au passage la qualité de l’@opendataParis !

item.title: #en @ 1503380857477816322
item.description: 📢Given the mass of people using reproducible workflows, I think it would be good for journals to start accepting Markdown files. This would be a huge boost to transparency. Life would be hugely easier, than having to bounce around .docs, .docx and .RMD😩! #openscience #opendata

item.title: #en @ 1502747969845669888
item.description: @DrEricDing @BiobotAnalytics @JPWeiland NYC open data has no new data on its site since 2/28. On the national site you are using, only one county is shown in New York. How can we see current data? It can be so useful now that we cannot depend on positivity due to so many uncounted home tests.

item.title: #en @ 1502676279971221506
item.description:
The Nationale Wegenbestand ("National Road Database") is a reliable open data file containing all public roads in the Netherlands.
Recently, it was updated by @Rijkswaterstaat to include bicycle paths; of which there are approximately 34,000 kilometers.
https://t.co/x2PvP5YI79 https://t.co/RnLmSz0CMc

item.title: #en @ 1502673136373932038
item.description:

Check it out at: https://t.co/ct52aAiWtu

item.title: #es @ 1502643528480002052
item.description: @apelaez1 DATOS + muchos👀puestos en esto. Con datos abiertos y de calidad se puede: 1. medir el fenómeno, tomar decisiones, 2. ponérsela difícil a quienes les conviene opacidad en sector público, 3. hacer análisis predictivos. En corrupción hay patrones, clave identificarlos con evidencia

item.description:
Will the conclusions from my table stay this way? We don't know. That's why @KKMPutrajaya monitors this data regularly, and updates our advice in line with data.
Members of the public like @tiotheo01 who use our open data and ask important questions are doing good work.

item.title: #en @ 1502404056505061386
item.description: To celebrate #OpenDataWeek, we just added a new feature to our OpenRecords Portal! Agencies can now indicate whether their FOIL responses include datasets and provide the source of the data. The information collected will help in making more data available on NYC OpenData. https://t.co/4vwPy1GINU

item.title: #pt @ 1502390465185947648
item.description:

Parabéns!

item.title: #es @ 1502372206931853327
item.description: Estoy investigando en temas de seguridad y @agaviriau hace un buen diagnóstico de lo que necesita el país. Añadiría un tema de integración de sistemas de información y datos abiertos, pero la tiene clara. Desde la distancia hoy ya votamos. Éxitos! https://t.co/xJOQNxn7bX

item.title: #es @ 1502364991143522313
item.description: ¿Sabían de la Guía de Reconstrucción de Puerto Rico? El tomo sobre infraestructura física hace referencia a la necesidad de un plan de transporte sostenible y la integración de datos abiertos a la toma de decisiones sobre la planificación y operación de nuestro sistema vial. https://t.co/YGbag1eNAs

item.title: #en @ 1502351807858806787
item.description:
Without an incentive to sell you things, Open Data Protocol allows you to consume the content you enjoy uninterrupted.
Your feed is chronological, ad-free, and non-algorithmic.
Our discord 👉 https://t.co/EqAkFT2Myb
#OPENDATAPROTOCOL $OPEN #Blockchain

item.title: #en @ 1502351388210307078
item.description:
Open Data Protocol is the best way to interact in Web 3.0 while earning rewards for content creation.
Have you ever asked yourself why centralized institutions receive all the profits for the content you do?
Let us know in the comments below. 💻 👇
#OPENDATAPROTOCOL $OPEN
